issue.subject: Add time stats to topextractions + add organisms details link to topdownloads
issue.description:
* Topextractions : add 3 cols (min, max, median) at then end of the table
* Topdownloads : add 1 col (link) to organisms details. This link will export product download count groupped by organisms directly to PDF.
* Add new backend parameter to choose length of "Top indicators" (will keep the default walue 5)

!Statistiques.png!

custom_fields.name: Ergonomic impact
custom_fields.value: Top indicators lenght will be customizable
